column3: and our server was as well. I ordered the little piggy went to China and it was very unique and tasty. I hated the kimchi Bloody Mary
column4: which is weird because I usually love both kimchi and Bloody Marys
column5: but I'm gonna chock that up as it just wasn't my taste. One disappointment I had was that the mimosas came in a regular cup
column6: as opposed to a wine glass
column7: but overall great breakfast and I would go back. Prices were also a bit high but I suppose for Chicago this is the norm maybe (I was from out of town).
